textBox.richText: After 4 years of development, the BEAT platform is now available for download as an open-source project, under the Affero GNU GPL version 3. It is composed of 6 packages which can be reached on this gitlab group repository, hosted at Idiap: https://gitlab.idiap.ch/beat To get started, download the package "beat.web" and read its README.rst file located on its root for quick start instructions: git clone https://gitlab.idiap.ch/beat/beat.web In case of issues, please share your questions through our mailing list (https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/beat-devel). The project totals ~80'000 lines of code split this way: Python: 58% Javascript: 24% HTML: 15% CSS: 3% It makes heavy use of other open-source projects (such as Django or Twisted) and builds on the top of these frameworks to create the experience you'll find through the web application (e.g. https://www.beat-eu.org/platform/). The Idiap instance of the platform is now updated with the software available on the link above. Let us know if you have issues accessing that link. Authors: Andre Anjos <andre.anjos@idiap.ch> Flavio Tarsetti <flavio.tarsetti@idiap.ch> Laurent El-Shafey <laurent.el-shafey@idiap.ch> Philip Abbet <philip.abbet@idiap.ch> Samuel Gaist <samuel.gaist@idiap.ch> Sebastien Marcel <sebastien.marcel@idiap.ch> Acknowledgements: To all partners of the BEAT project, for being so supportive in the development of this wonderful tool. Thanks to all! André and Sébastien
Open Source Release of the BEAT Platform
